summary: Frontend testing completed for RUNETIC e-commerce new features. All requested features verified working correctly: packaging options with enable/disable and editable prices, Mujer Fan and Mujer Player versions, kid sizes (2,4,6,8,10,12,14,16), profits module with revenue/costs/profit calculations, About Us section, RUNETIC brand not translated, and WOMPI external backend integration.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All new features verified working: 1) Admin Products page has packaging options with checkboxes to enable/disable and editable price fields for each option (Caja Normal $0, Caja Premium $5000, Empaque Regalo $8000, Sin Caja $0), 2) Versions include Hombre Fan, Hombre Jugador, Mujer Fan, Mujer Player, and NiÃ±o - each with configurable sizes, 3) Kid (NiÃ±o) version has numeric sizes 2,4,6,8,10,12,14,16, 4) Profits module shows Ingresos Totales, Costos Totales, Ganancia Neta, Ticket Promedio with period filters and export functionality, 5) About Us section (Â¿QuiÃ©nes Somos?) displays on home page with Nuestra Historia, Nuestro PropÃ³sito, Canales de Venta, and Nuestros Clientes subsections, 6) RUNETIC brand name has translate='no' attribute to prevent translation, 7) Checkout uses external WOMPI backend at https://wompi-backend-production.up.railway.app/create-payment

admin_packaging_options.details: Packaging options section shows 4 options (Caja Normal, Caja Premium, Empaque Regalo, Sin Caja) with checkboxes to enable/disable and editable price input fields

mujer_fan_version.details: Mujer Fan version available in admin products and product detail page with sizes XS, S, M, L, XL

mujer_player_version.details: Mujer Player version available in admin products (can be enabled per product) with ðŸ’ª icon

runetic_not_translated.details: RUNETIC brand name has translate='no' attribute - found 10 elements with this attribute on home page

wompi_external_backend.details: Checkout.js correctly configured to use external WOMPI backend at https://wompi-backend-production.up.railway.app/create-payment for PSE and card payments

version_selector_icons.details: Version selector shows emoji icons: ðŸ‘¨ Hombre Fan, âš¡ Hombre Jugador, ðŸ‘© Mujer Fan, ðŸ’ª Mujer Player, ðŸ‘¦ NiÃ±o

notes: The Mujer Player version is available in admin but needs to be enabled per product. Products that don't have it enabled won't show it in the version dropdown - this is correct behavior. Color selector with visual circles is implemented in ProductDetail.js but only shows for products that have colors configured.
